media.headline: Altuve receives Silver Slugger
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Altuve receives Silver Slugger Award
media.bigblurb: Jose Altuve receives his 2016 Silver Slugger Award and Rod Carew Award before taking on the Mariners on Opening Day

media.headline: Segura's first hit as a Mariner
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Segura collects first hit with Mariners
media.bigblurb: Jean Segura grounds a base hit up the middle off Dallas Keuchel to lead off the 1st inning, recording his first hit as a Mariner

media.headline: Springer's leadoff home run
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer cranks a leadoff home run to left
media.bigblurb: George Springer belts a leadoff home run deep to left field to give the Astros an early 1-0 lead

media.headline: Altuve's slick pick
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Altuve makes a smooth stop to get the out
media.bigblurb: Jose Altuve plays an in-between hop up the middle for a nice stop, then throws to first to get Mike Zunino in the 3rd

media.headline: Astros' pregame introductions
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Astros introduce their roster on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Astros introduce their coaching staff and roster on Opening Day prior to the game against the Mariners in Houston

media.headline: Keuchel's barehanded play
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel fields a bunt, gets the out
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel plays a bunt off the bat of Jean Segura with his bare hand and fires to first base to get the final out of the top of the 3rd

media.headline: Segura turns two
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Segura snags liner, turns two in the 1st
media.bigblurb: Jean Segura reaches to catch a sharp liner off the bat of Carlos Correa and throws back to second base for an inning-ending double play

media.headline: Biggio's ceremonial first pitch
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Biggio throws first pitch for Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Craig Biggio takes the mound to throw out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day

media.headline: Mariners' pregame introductions
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Mariners introduce their Opening Day lineup
media.bigblurb: The Mariners introduce their coaching staff and roster on Opening Day prior to their game against the Astros in Houston

media.headline: Clay Walker sings anthem
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Clay Walker sings the national anthem
media.bigblurb: Country music artist Clay Walker sings the national anthem before the Astros host the Mariners on Opening Day

media.headline: Correa's monster solo home run
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa crushes solo homer out of ballpark
media.bigblurb: Carlos Correa launches a solo home run deep to left field and out of the ballpark, extending the Astros' lead to 2-0 in the 4th inning

media.headline: Correa's nice throw
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa, Gurriel team up to get Zunino
media.bigblurb: Carlos Correa ranges to his right and makes a long throw to Yulieski Gurriel, who stretches to catch the bouncing ball to get the out

media.headline: Correa's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa plates Bregman with sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Carlos Correa lifts a ball to center field to drive in Alex Bregman on a sacrifice fly, extending the Astros' lead to 3-0 in the 6th

media.headline: Springer's running grab
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer covers ground to rob Cruz in center
media.bigblurb: George Springer tracks a hard-hit ball off the bat of Nelson Cruz and runs it down to make an impressive grab in center field

media.headline: Trainers check on Felix
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Felix gets a visit from the trainers
media.bigblurb: Felix Hernandez gets a visit from the trainers after covering first base to nab Josh Reddick, and later exits the game with groin tightness

media.headline: Keuchel's incredible play
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel makes a superb play to nab Martin
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel fields a bunt from Leonys Martin with his bare hand and makes a jump throw to first base while on the run to get the out

media.headline: 'God Bless America' in Houston
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Clay Walker sings during 7th-inning stretch
media.bigblurb: Country music artist Clay Walker takes the field to sing God Bless America during the 7th-inning stretch in Houston

media.headline: Keuchel escapes bases-loaded jam
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel leaves the bases loaded in 4th
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel gets Leonys Martin to ground out to second base to get out of a bases-loaded jam in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Correa's 449-ft. homer
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa belts 449-foot homer over the tracks
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the home run distance of Carlos Correa's Opening Day home run over the train tracks at Minute Maid Park

media.headline: Giles locks down the save
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Giles strikes out the side to seal 3-0 win
media.bigblurb: Ken Giles strikes out all three batters in the top of the 9th inning to secure a 3-0 Astros victory in Houston on Opening Day

media.headline: Keuchel excels defensively
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel shows off with barehanded plays
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel makes a pair of nice plays off the mound, making two barehanded plays against the Mariners

media.headline: Correa on Opening Day victory
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa discusses home run, Keuchel
media.bigblurb: Carlos Correa discusses his solo home run, Dallas Keuchel's performance and what an Opening Day win does for the Astros' confidence

media.headline: Keuchel's solid start in opener
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel tosses seven shutout innings
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel tosses seven shutout innings and fans four in a 3-0 win over the Mariners on Opening Day

media.headline: Hinch on win over Mariners
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Hinch discusses Correa, win over Mariners
media.bigblurb: Astros manager A.J. Hinch talks about his players' ability to make key plays and the maturation of Carlos Correa

media.headline: Recap: SEA 0, HOU 3
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Keuchel leads Astros to Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Dallas Keuchel pitched seven scoreless innings and George Springer and Carlos Correa each homered in the Astros' 3-0 win

media.headline: Keuchel on Opening Day start
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Keuchel discusses his Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Dallas Keuchel discusses his winning start to 2017 with seven scoreless innings versus the Mariners

media.headline: Servais on Felix's outing
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Servais discusses Felix Hernandez's start
media.bigblurb: Mariners manager Scott Servais discusses Felix Hernandez's outing, his disdain for the sacrifice bunt, preparation and the long season ahead

media.headline: Giles on Astros' win in opener
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Giles' discusses Astros' Opening Day victory
media.bigblurb: Astros reliever Ken Giles discusses the Astros' 3-0 win on Opening Day and his mentality in the 9th inning

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: SEA@HOU
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: SEA@HOU
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: SEA@HOU

media.headline: Correa on Opening Day win
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Correa discusses Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Shortstop Carlos Correa discusses his home run that helped lead the Astros to a 3-0 victory against the Mariners on Opening Day

media.headline: Springer on batting leadoff
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer on lineup role, leading off
media.bigblurb: George Springer discusses his role in the lineup after leading off the game versus the Mariners with a home run

media.headline: Pazos retires Aoki
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Pazos gets Aoki to ground to short
media.bigblurb: James Pazos gets Norichika Aoki to ground out to short, retiring his fourth straight batter in his Mariners debut
